metadataStandardName.gco:CharacterString: ISO 19139 Geographic Information - Metadata - Implementation Specification

purpose.gco:CharacterString: MS PSC Current Utility Certificated Areas

credit.gco:CharacterString: Utility information compiled by the Public Utilities Staff. The map was generated by the Certificated Area Mapping Information Systm (CAMIS). Base data were supplied by the Mississippi Automated Resource Information System (MARIS). The utility information and base data contained on this map are considered dependable, but the accuracy, completeness, and currency thereof are not guaranteed. The Mississippi Public Utilities Staff and MARIS make no warranties, expressed or implied as to the accuracy, completeness, currency, reliability, or suitability, for any particular purpose of any data or information contained in or generated from this map. The State of Mississippi, the Mississippi Public Utilities Staff, and MARIS or any employee thereof assumes no liability associated with the use of this map.
